org.peertrust.security.credentials
Class CredentialStore

java.lang.Object
  org.peertrust.security.credentials.CredentialStore
Direct Known Subclasses:
X509CredentialStore
public abstract class CredentialStore
extends java.lang.Object

Manages storage and retrieval of Credentials for automated trust negotiation.

addCredential

public void addCredential(Credential credential)
                   throws CredentialException
Adds a Credential to the store. It will be stored, the next time saveAllCredentials is invoked.

Parameters:
arg - The encoded Credential that should be stored. The class of this Object depends on the implementation of the class Credential.
Throws:
CredentialException
